document_data.name: Thal
document_data.mainbody: '''"Thal"''' was the assumed identity of a [[doppelganger]] in [[Shadowdale]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: In his usual guise, Thal was barefoot and had bright eyes.
document_data.Activities: Thal spent some time as a hand at the [[Old Skull Inn]], and sometimes led travelers into ambushes under the pretense of taking them to see [[Elminster Aumar]].
document_data.Relationships: Thal worked with a number of other doppelgangers.
document_data.History:
When in early spring of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, the [[Bloodshields]] came to [[Shadowdale]], Thal was asked to lead them to Elminster, whom they sought. Thal led them to a cave where another doppelganger pretended to be Elminster, and a number of other doppelgangers had an ambush prepared; the Bloodshields did not survive.

A later attempt to ambush a number of [[War Wizards]] with the same trick failed, however, and Thal was ''held'' for questioning by War Wizard [[Lemmeth]].{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|334|32}}
